text: Todd Wallace Blanche (born August 6, 1974) is an American lawyer and former prosecutor who has been the 40th United States Deputy Attorney General since 2025. Blanche is best known for representing former U.S. president Donald Trump in the 2024 criminal trial in New York. On November 14, 2024, President- elect Trump announced that he planned to nominate Blanche for United States Deputy Attorney General. He was confirmed to the post by the U.S. Senate on March 5, 2025 in a 52-46 vote. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1974 births Category:Lawyers from New York (state) Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Florida Category:United States Deputy Attorneys General
title: Todd Blanche
